title: "What is Family and Relationship Balance Coaching and How is it Taught?"
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discussed the importance of understanding oneself and one's environment to operate effectively. The focus then shifted to the role of family balance coaching in creating and strengthening familial relationships. The author explored the necessary skills and techniques used by coaches to achieve this, emphasizing the differences between coaching for business and coaching for families. In the last 200 words, the author further explains how family coaching works, using systemic models and methodologies like enneagrams and family therapy to create a relationship grounded in communication and value systems. The coach helps the family identify areas of improvement and work on creating healthier and more satisfying relationships.
content: Il fine della relazione deve essere provare gioia assieme quotidianamente, e il coach di equilibrio familiare si confronta con le emozioni negative della: gelosia paura dell'abbandono ossessività controllo e per i fantasmi del passato che molto spesso avvelenano la situazione Le tecniche di coaching familiare insegnate nella nostra scuola implementano i modelli sistemici di base con le metodologie dell'enneagramma e della terapia della famiglia, sviluppandole però in un contesto di coaching. Un coach di equilibrio familiare interviene anche per evitare che un problema di relazione entri in una spirale negativa e da piccoli problemi si arrivi a gravi conflitti e conseguenze relazionali. I passaggi del coaching familiare sono: chiarire cosa si vuole veramente in una relazione comprendere le vie in cui i partner in una relazione operano osservare la congruenza tra comportamento effettivo e comportamento dichiarato aiutare a trovare nuove maniere per creare una relazione soddisfacente Differenze tra il coaching sistemico per il business ed il coaching familiare A differenza del coaching individuale, il coaching di equilibrio familiare ha sempre a che fare con un sistema. Un'altra caratteristica dei sistemi familiari rispetto al coaching per il business è che le relazioni che si creano sono supposte durare. Infine l'aspetto personale è all'interno di tale coaching imprescindibile.
last_phrase: In summary, the ultimate goal of family coaching is to experience daily joy together. A family coach addresses negative emotions such as jealousy, fear of abandonment, obsessiveness, and control, while utilizing systemic coaching models with enneagram and family therapy methodologies. The coaching process involves clarifying relationship desires, understanding partners' behaviors, observing congruence, and finding new ways to build a satisfying relationship. Unlike business coaching, family coaching always involves a system and focuses on interpersonal aspects. It is suitable for individuals, families, conflicted parents, couples in crisis, single people, and those who struggle with separation trauma. Effective coaching can improve self-esteem, resolve difficult situations, and prevent negative outcomes. Our school teaches family coaching by implementing systemic coaching models with enneagram and family therapy methodologies in a coaching context.
